resources.string: SwiFTP is open source software by Dave Revell and contributors
"Can't start until wifi is enabled, click here to refresh"

This is an early beta release of SwiFTP that lacks some features, so please be patient.

\ \ Once you have started the server, you may access it with the username "anonymous" and \ any password. Your FTP client must use PASV mode.

\ \ Look in the /sdcard directory for your music and other files.

\ \ Wifi must be enabled before the server will start. This version of SwiFTP doesn't use the \ 3G network.

\ \ For security reasons, it's recommended that the server be stopped after use.

\ Full instructions are on the wiki at http://www.swiftp.org/.

\ \ Don't be alarmed by messages about ignored or unrecognized commands, these are normal as \ long as they don't cause undesired behavior.

\ \ Thanks for using SwiFTP, and look for fixes and improvements soon.
\
Settings will take effect when the server is started/restarted.
The username must consist of 1 or more letters. No other characters are allowed.
The password must consist of 1 or more alphanumeric characters. No other characters are allowed.
The port number must be in the range 1025 to 65535.
